doc.title: Topless Femen activists attempt to confront Silvio Berlusconi as he votes in Italian elections - video
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Three women from the Ukrainian feminist group Femen attempt to disrupt former premier Silvio Berlusconi as he votes in the Italian elections on Sunday

main.head: Topless Femen activists attempt to confront Silvio Berlusconi as he votes in Italian elections - video
main.p: This article is more than 12 years old

Three women from the Ukrainian feminist group Femen attempt to disrupt former premier Silvio Berlusconi as he votes in the Italian elections on Sunday. The activists pull off their sweaters to bare their breasts and display the slogan - enough of Silvio - written on their bodies in Italian, as Berlusconi enters a polling station in Milan
